attacks.name: Breaking Sound
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bass Control
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunderous Roar
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
